shows.name: Breaking Bad
shows.description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

shows.name: Money Heist
shows.description: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

shows.name: Juzni Vetar
shows.description: Petar Maras continues his expansion in criminal underworld while saving his family.

shows.name: The Last Dance
shows.description: Charting the rise of the 1990s Chicago Bulls, led by Michael Jordan, one of the most notable dynasties in sports history.
